Articles.Content: I've been noticing that crashes that Kerbals would have likely survived in KSP1 are lethal in KSP2.  Even the external command seat will no longer protect you.
I noticed the opposite. My Kerbal fell from the top of launch tower, not a scratch.
Also, the OX-STAT XL is a damn beast; rolled a ~10T rover over on them several times, even rocked back and forth to get right, takes quite an impact to take them out.
